DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate AIR OPTIX® plus HYDRAGLYDE® ( AOHG ) contact lens compare AIR OPTIX® AQUA ( AOA ) contact lenses overall lens fit .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Lotrafilcon B Lenses With Different Packaging Solutions
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects must wear contact lens prior visit Day 1 ( Insertion ) Period 1 Day 1 ( Insertion ) Period 2 . This study conduct United Kingdom .
DOC.criteria: Must sign Informed Consent Document ; Manifest cylinder less equal 0.75 Diopter ( D ) eye ; Successful current wearer ( past 2 month minimum 5 day per week 8 hour per day ) AOA contact lens within protocolspecified power range ; Willing answer text message daily basis study ; Willing discontinue artificial tear rewetting drop day study visit ; Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Habitual lens wear extended wear modality ( routinely sleep lens overnight 1 night per week ) ; Any anterior segment infection , inflammation , disease abnormality contraindicate contact lens wear ( within 7 day enrollment , current ) ; History herpetic keratitis , corneal surgery irregular cornea ; Any use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; Pregnant lactating ; Participation clinical study within 30 day Visit 1 ; Other protocolspecified exclusion criterion may apply .
